arts.ttl: Chris Davies explains what Birmingham City ‘didn’t have’ - but it’s now guaranteed - Birmingham Live
arts.sum: Chris Davies has lauded Birmingham City’s team spirit after a new-look squad stormed to promotion with six games to spare. The club signed 17 new players last summer and Davies offloaded a similar number to transform his squad.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies plans to celebrate Birmingham City promotion and reveals huddle message to players
arts.sum: Restoring Birmingham City to the Championship ‘means the world’, says Chris Davies after his Blues side clinched promotion with six games of the League One season to spare. Chris Davies plans to celebrate Birmingham City promotion and reveals huddle message to players

arts.ttl: Someone got a shock this season - and it wasn’t Birmingham City - Brian Dick - Birmingham Live
arts.sum: Chris Davies's runaway League One leaders face Peterborough United on Sunday, April 13 in the final of the Vertu Trophy, looking to clinch the first past of a double after a season of incredible success. If Blues have had a surprise it’s that promotion, secured at Peterborough United this evening in front of Barry Fry, has come so early.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City player ratings vs Peterborough after May and TGH seal promotion
arts.sum: Alfie May and Taylor Gardner-Hickman scored the goals at the Weston Homes Stadium, either side of a Kwame Poku leveller, to send Blues up with six games to spare. The Blues skipper looked strong in the air and sharp on the ball, playing a number of raking passes out to Sampsted on the right.

arts.ttl: Birmingham clinch promotion with win at Peterborough
Birmingham City transfers as Blues rival Arsenal for teen goal machine and legacy deal emerges
arts.sum: In the last 24 hours alone Blues have been linked with three players ahead of what is sure to be an exciting summer window with Chris Davies looking to reinforce a squad that has steamrollered League One. Birmingham City transfers as Blues rival Arsenal for teen goal machine and legacy deal emerges

arts.ttl: Birmingham City remain keen on out-of-contract Championship star
arts.sum: Birmingham City are still monitoring Swansea City centre-back Harry Darling, a report from Wales Online has said. Birmingham… The post Birmingham City remain keen on out-of-contract Championship star appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City’s promotion permutations and when they will be crowned League One champions
arts.sum: Birmingham City will win promotion to the Championship with a victory over Peterborough United on Tuesday night – but they won’t be crowned League One champions. Should Blues beat Peterborough and Wrexham fail to win their next game at Wigan Athletic on Saturday, the League One title will go to Blues.

arts.ttl: May puts the frighteners on Willumsson as Ferguson fumes before Birmingham City
arts.sum: Chris Davies's runaway League One leaders face Peterborough United on Sunday, April 13 in the final of the Vertu Trophy, looking to clinch the first past of a double after a season of incredible success. Stansfield pulled rank on Kieran Dowell to convert his ninth penalty of the season in Blues’ win over Barnsley and bring up his 22nd goal in all competitions.

arts.ttl: Jay Stansfield: 'Something was missing and I found that when I came back to Birmingham City'
arts.sum: “I can’t really remember much of the game (Exeter beat Cambridge 1-0 to win promotion to the Football League) but I’ve got a picture of my whole family and I think I was standing next to a police horse outside Wembley because I used to love horses,” he explained. Exclusive: Jay Stansfield opens up on finding his way back to Birmingham City, the injury which made him fear missing out on Wembley and his impending debut at the national stadium
